max_shouts_number: Maximum number of shouts that can be returned
deleted_shouts_included: Shouts marked as deleted will be included in this number
warning_permanent: Warning: These actions are permanent and cannot be undone!
remove_deleted_confirmation: Are you sure you wish to remove all shouts marked as deleted from the database?
success_removing_deleted: Successfully removed all shouts marked as deleted from the database
remove_all_confirmation: Are you sure you wish to remove all shouts from the database
success_removing_all: Successfully removed all shouts from the database
